sentences.en: At what point does a noble deed turn into fanaticism?
sentences.cn: 告诉我，是怎么从做一桩善举，走上不归路的？

sentences.en: Doubt and fanaticism are two sides of the same development.
sentences.cn: 怀疑与狂热是同一新生事物的两面。

sentences.en: But he denied that they were religious to the point of fanaticism.
sentences.cn: 但是他否认他们虔诚到成为狂热教徒的地步。
